description:
cmd/go: treat all commands in exp/ as tools

Nothing in exp should get installed directly in bin,
at least not by default.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1c1ac1cac5cd ***

cmd/go: treat all commands in exp/ as tools

Nothing in exp should get installed directly in bin,
at least not by default.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6497138

subject: code review 6497138: cmd/go: treat all commands in exp/ as tools
